amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds by the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to accept, consider, or rely on third-party intentional dosing human studies for pesticides or to conduct intentional dosing human studies for pesticides.

action.text: Amendment SA 1023 proposed by Senator Dorgan for Senator Boxer.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1023 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 60 - 37. Record Vote Number: 162.
